ComicInfo.Title: If Looks Could Kill, Part 4: Nothing a Little Make-Up Couldn't Fix
ComicInfo.Summary: One of them can't access his mutant powers; the other one can't use his healing factor. But Cable and Deadpool are still going to fight -- not only for the sake of gratuitous, all-out action; but also for honor, the betterment of mankind and the well-being of puppies everywhere. (Okay, we made up the part about puppies.)
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-08-04 15:05:19. [CVDB105831]
ComicInfo.Penciller: Patrick Zircher, Patrick Zircher, Rob Liefeld
ComicInfo.Characters: Cable, Deadpool, Hammer, Irene Merryweather, Lightmaster
ComicInfo.Locations: Chicago, Daily Bugle Building, France, Germany, New York City
